resources.string: Get Started:\n1. Launch the RemoteDroid desktop application on your computer.\n2. Enter your IP address, or select a host from the list below:
To use this program, you will need the companion RemoteDroid desktop application. If you don\'t already have it, you can download it here:
Once you have downloaded, installed and launched the RemoteDroid application on your computer, it will display your IP address. Enter this IP address on your phone to connect it to your computer.
Tap the menu button for preferences or help.
